thread.title: Warriors waive Ben Gordon after bringing him in for tryout
thread.title_full: Warriors waive Ben Gordon after bringing him in for tryout

title: Warriors waive Ben Gordon after bringing him in for tryout
text:
Warriors waive Ben Gordon after bringing him in for tryout 
Ben Gordon had two points and two assists in two exhibition games with the Warriors. 
Noah Graham / NBAE via Getty Images AP Oct 15, 2015 at 4:58a ET 0 
OAKLAND, Calif. â€” The Golden State Warriors have waived guard Ben Gordon . 
Gordon was brought into camp on a tryout basis last month but the Warriors decided to cut ties with him Wednesday. 
Gordon had two points and two assists in two exhibition games. 
The 32-year-old Gordon has averaged 14.9 points per game for his career and is a 40 percent shooter from 3-point range. He averaged 6.2 points in 56 games for Orlando last season. 0
